title: BRIEF-BD Multi Media H1 revenue down at 4.1 mln euros
text:
BRIEF-BD Multi Media H1 revenue down at 4.1 mln euros 
Oct 23 BD Multi Media SA : 
* H1 revenue 4.1 million euros ($4.6 million) versus 5.6 million euros year ago 
* H1 operating loss 559,000 euros versus profit of 137,000 euros year ago Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.9003 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
